ensg.eu.project.enveloppes

Class QuickConvexHull

  • java.lang.Object
    • ensg.eu.project.enveloppes.Envelope
      • ensg.eu.project.enveloppes.ConvexHull
        • ensg.eu.project.enveloppes.QuickConvexHull
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEnvelope

    public class QuickConvexHull
extends ConvexHull
    This class compute the convex hull of a set of points using QuickHull algorithm
    Author:
    Aiman R'KYEK

      • getEnvelope

        public com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Polygon getEnvelope(java.util.List<Point> pointsList)
        This function return a polygon as the convex hull of a list of points
        Parameters:
        pointsList - List of point of type Point
        Returns:
        return a polygon of the convex hull of the pointsList
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - In case there's less than 3 points in the list of points

        Parameters:

        ex2 - second extremity
        pointsList - Points list
        hullPoints - Hull point

      • locationFromSegment

        public int locationFromSegment(Point ex1,
                               Point ex2,
                               Point p)
        This function find the location of a point from a segment of the other two points
        Parameters:
        ex1 - first extremity
        ex2 - second extremity
        p - point to found his location from the segment
        Returns:
        1 if the point is in the right of the segment and -1 if it in the left
